about_the_game:
"Dragoon Ascension" is a 2D Party-Based RPG inspired by the Final Fantasy series. Once the most prominent kingdom in the world, Windfall has been in a gradual decline over the years. To amend the mistakes of past nobility, Duke Vergo plans on promoting your character to be the commander of the Royal Guard. This promotion is conditional upon completing the necessary training to become a dragoon. Will you be the first to ascend to this rank?

COMPLETE BOUNTIES

Eliminate specific enemies of the kingdom to receive rewards, such as gold and treasure hunts. As you complete more bounties, you'll unlock new bounties and other perks for helping the kingdom.

CRAFT GEAR

Once your party has obtained enough of the required raw materials, you can work with the blacksmith to craft weapons, armor, and shields. Also, you can upgrade equipment to perform better than the equipment found in shops.

FIGHT IN THE ARENA

Battle enemies that are exclusive to the arena. Unlock new challenge modes. As these new modes are unlocked, you can work towards obtaining rare items and equipment.

KEY FEATURES

  • Active time progress battle system

  • Learn new abilities from gaining levels, as well as from items

  • Side quests and activities, such as treasure hunts

  • Explore dungeons and defeat bosses to make Windfall prominent once again

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft Windows® 10/11 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGL / VRAM 1GB or better
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft Windows® 10/11 (64bit)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Dragoon Ascension is a Party-Based RPG that strikes a balance between adventure and combat. Defeat enemies and witness the rise of the kingdom of Windfall. Find tomes that the Ancients left behind to learn their secrets. Become the ultimate weapon.
